content.raw: One would expect this if the code were written by someone who made it to Senior Reaction Engineer in spacechem maybe, but otherwise the naïve way of making buttons do things asynchronously is to spawn a new thread each time the button is pressed, which would result in interleaving (if not complete breakage).
